data.text:
Indiana is the crossroads of America.

When Democrat governors hand out driver’s licenses to people from all over the world who don’t know English, can’t read our road signs, and disobey our laws, Hoosiers get killed.

We have to put a stop to it!
Where are the protests and walkouts for the 4 Indiana men killed this week by an illegal Joe Biden let into our country?

This is insane. This is at least the 6th Hoosier killed by an illegal immigrant on Indiana roads since November. 

Meanwhile, Democrats are talking about cutting funding to ICE. It’s outrageous.

We must deport them all now and get them off our roads! https://t.co/NvCrVVFdvq

Congratulations to Justin Olson on his confirmation to the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Indiana! President Trump continues to put up strong nominees who will defend the Constitution. https://t.co/4CLp2S6TlA

4 men from Indiana were killed this week because of an illegal Joe Biden allowed into the country. 

Husbands, fathers, sons all gone. 

We must deport every illegal and get them off our roads! https://t.co/n07xP0vqpj

American taxpayers are getting ripped off. People who sponsor legal immigrants are required to repay welfare costs. But Washington has never enforced this law. 

Time for that to end

https://t.co/c9xNLppxSt

Thank you Secretary Duffy for the update. The full force of the law needs to be applied here. Anyone knowingly putting unqualified illegal drivers on our roads must be punished. https://t.co/Vb2eonegbc

Proof of citizenship to register to vote and photo ID at the ballot box. It’s common sense.

We need to pass the SAVE America Act ASAP! 

@SeanMoran3 

https://t.co/1oWOijCQRE https://t.co/NZNdzanw8F
Dr. Oz is right. The transgender madness has caused serious harm to so many children. I hope this decision from the ASPS is the first of many to come. https://t.co/AVAWnapWdi

President Trump is right.

Congress must protect our federal elections.

The SAVE America Act will:
✅ Require proof of citizenship to vote
✅ Require photo ID at the ballot box

The Senate must do whatever it takes to get this passed. 

My full statement ⬇️ https://t.co/1cp1tXEUER
